message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to discuss the possibility of selling you this amazing product. I think it's a great fit for you, and I'm willing to make a competitive offer. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12,000.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Can you meet me at that price?

Hi Bob, thank you for your offer, but I'm afraid I can't meet you at $9,000. However, I'm willing to compromise and sell the product to you for $10,500. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value to you.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle, but I can only go up to $9,800. Can you consider that?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I'm still not comfortable with $9,800. I'm willing to make another concession and sell the product to you for $11,000. This is as low as I can go, and I think it's still a great deal for both of us.
I appreciate your concession, but I'm still looking for a better deal. I'm willing to pay $10,200. Can you meet me there?

Hi Bob, I understand that you're looking for a better deal, but I'm not willing to go any higher than $11,500. This is already a significant discount from the original price, and I'm not comfortable going any lower. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $10,200 and $11,500, so I'm offering it to you for $11,350. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your final offer, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to pay $10,200, and that's my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.

Hi Bob, I understand that you're not willing to budge from $10,200, but I'm still not comfortable selling the product to you at that price. I'm willing to make one more concession and sell it to you for $11,000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I hope you'll reconsider.
I've made several concessions, and I'm not willing to go any higher than $10,200. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to meet me there, I'll have to explore other options.
